panels.description: The time measured from the last re-sync of ZK node.
panels.title: Last re-sync of $node_id

panels.description:
Total count of znodes stored in ZK ensemble.

Every time a client deletes a new znode (either explicitly or by dropping its ephemeral znodes after disconnection), this counter will decrement.
panels.title: Number of znodes

panels.description: Approximate memory consumption for all znodes stored in the ZK ensemble.
panels.title: Approximate Data Size
